reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck shirt comfortable, soft, and well-made, appreciating its good fit, with one noting it tapers slightly at the waist. The shirt keeps them warm in winter, and they like its appearance, with one mentioning it looks more expensive than its price. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some loving it while others find it weird.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Fit, Flattering, and Great Quality – My New Go-To Turtleneck!
items.body: I absolutely love this Ekouaer turtleneck sweater! I bought it in two colors, including the beige, and they’re both gorgeous. The XS fits perfectly—it’s snug without being tight, and the ribbed design is super flattering. The midweight material is cozy and soft, making it perfect for layering or wearing on its own. The quality is amazing for the price—it feels premium and looks much more expensive than it actually is. I’ve worn it for both casual outings and to work, and it’s versatile enough for both. Highly recommend this sweater if you're looking for a stylish, comfortable, and well-made piece for your wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Jenzles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and versatile!
items.body: These turtlenecks are amazing! I normally don't order stuff like this online as I really prefer to check things out in person prior to purchasing. I like my turtlenecks long-waisted and snug (but not skin tight). I'm 5'5", 150# and ordered Medium. Fits perfectly. The shirt is on the thinner side with subtle ribbing. Perfect for layering or to wear alone! I have black, beige and pink and will definitely order more colors! Read more
items.author: mom2amk

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't care for the material
items.body: Just ok. The small was a good size for my measurements but ultimately didn't care for the material. Was stretchy and decently thick but not like a soft cotton thick. A weird thick and kinda shiny. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality turtleneck at a great price.
items.body: The material is wonderful on these, I have only washed and dried them once so don't know how they will hold up to that. The fit is long, which I like, and certainly help keep you warmer through the cold, long, NY winters. Classic, flattering look. Read more
items.author: Randi Perkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable material
items.body: The material has a nice weight to it— better than expected! The fit is good and the color was true to the online picture. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Happy with This Purchase!
items.body: Great Find if Your Love Turtlenecks like I do. Medium weight, soft and nice stretch. The Color is such a pretty shade of Green, it’s truly a very nice top. Read more
items.author: Gina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like them !
items.body: I really like these shirts . The material is just right , comfy and has a bit of stretch . I’m 155lbs 5’5” and the Medium fit just right and the length is good . Im short waisted and it elongated my torso . I got in the beige which is the most perfect shade of ivory ( I’m a true spring in color analysis) and I also got the brown2 which is a nice caramel shade . I also got navy blue and returned it because the shade was a bit too cool and deep for my skin tone . I’ll also add that it too was a size M but was tighter than the other two particularly the turtleneck portion which was uncomfortable . The return and refund was quick same day . I’d like to get a couple more . Read more
items.author: Marie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Army Green, Blue, Deep Brown, Ice Green, Black, Brown-2, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Light Brown-2, Light Brown-3, Rose Red, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
